definition: (of male or female homosexuals) characterized by stereotypically male traits or appearance, (slang) offensive term for a lesbian who is noticeably masculine
details:
adjective
- (of male or female homosexuals) characterized by stereotypically male traits or appearance
- used of men
= synonyms: macho
noun
- (slang) offensive term for a lesbian who is noticeably masculine
= synonyms: dike, dyke
